focus: : generate ideas for proactive thinking exercises

next_steps.note: "Brainstorm 10-15 proactive thinking scenarios relevant to our company/industry. Document these in a shared document.",
"Research 3-5 existing proactive thinking exercises/frameworks (e.g., premortems, 'what if' analyses, scenario planning) and summarize their core principles.",
"Develop a simple template for a 'premortem' exercise focused on a hypothetical future project or initiative.",
"Identify 3-5 potential stakeholders to pilot test the proactive thinking exercises with.",
"Define success metrics for the pilot tests (e.g., number of potential risks identified, quality of solutions proposed, participant engagement)."
